i ve never been to the beach.

content.text: Thank you! I'm going to enjoy my weekend without any kids around.
Sounds relaxing! What do you like to do to relax?
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
Oh nice! I love piano. I like to learn new things to keep my mind sharp.
That's great! What have you been learning recently?
I've been learning how to play the guitar. It's a lot harder than it looks!
Oh nice! I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar. I'm more of a piano player myself.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn piano, but I'm not sure if I have the patience for it.
It takes a lot of practice, but it's definitely worth it. I love being able to play any song I want.
Yeah, I can see that. It would be so cool to be able to play a song for someone and just have them be amazed.
It is really cool. I love being able to play for my family and friends. It always makes them happy.
I bet! I'm sure they really appreciate it.
They do. I'm really glad I learned how to play the piano.
Me too! I think it's a great skill to have.
